y.",CancerGov,Bile Duct Cancer (Cholangiocarcinoma)
What are the treatments for Bile Duct Cancer (Cholangiocarcinoma) ?,"Key Points
                    - There are different types of treatment for patients with bile duct cancer.    - Three types of standard treatment are used:         - Surgery     - Radiation therapy     - Chemotherapy        - New types of treatment are being tested in clinical trials.         - Liver transplant        - Patients may want to think about taking part in a clinic
